sentences.english: Then something very strange had happened to her.
sentences.chinese: 接下来在她身上发生了咄咄怪事。

sentences.english: And in Atlanta, a bizarre incident at a gas station.
sentences.chinese: 亚特兰大一家加油站，发生了咄咄怪事。

definition: to be the most ridiculous thing in the world (idiom)
pinyin: hua2 tian1 xia4 zhi1 da4 ji1

definition: absolutely ridiculous (idiom); preposterous/the height of folly
to make a fool of oneself/to make oneself a laughing stock
strange tales and absurd arguments (idiom)/unreasonable remarks
sth else/a separate matter/not the same thing/with different jobs (not colleagues)/a remarkable thing/sth special/an odd thing/sth strange or incomprehensible
to have disastrous consequences/also written 貽害無窮|贻害无穷[yi2 hai4 wu2 qiong2]
lit. to burn zithers and cook cranes/fig. to waste valuable resources/to destroy wantonly beautiful things
overt/to make no secret (of one's presence)/grandiose/with great scope
